ground_truth_reviews.comment: The manual iteration and appending to build `posts_list` is verbose and not idiomatic Python. This can be simplified significantly for better readability and conciseness. A list comprehension would be a better choice here: `return [post for post in all_posts]`. Even better, since you are not modifying the posts, you can return the list from the service call directly: `return post_service.get_all_posts()`.

title: feat: Implement endpoint to retrieve all posts
body: This change adds the functionality to fetch all posts via the GET /posts endpoint. It retrieves the posts from the PostService and returns them as a list.
